imdb.title: Endride
imdb.plot: When a crystal transports Shun to Endra, only Prince Emilio can help him back home. But first, he must help Emilio get back his throne.

episodes.title: Ride
episodes.plot: Shun Asanaga, a young man with an obsession with crystals, finds himself pulled into a world within one.

episodes.title: Endora
episodes.plot: After escaping the castle, an encounter with an old friend helps reveal some of the mysteries surrounding Endora.

episodes.title: Journey
episodes.plot: Shun and Emilio escape to a hideout but soon abandon it to begin their journey to defeat Delzaine.

episodes.title: Ignauts
episodes.plot: When they're ambushed by a band of revolutionaries, Shun and Emilio make surprising new allies.

episodes.title: Assault
episodes.plot: Lacking in numbers to revolt, the Ignauts consider an alliance with the very group that attacks them.

episodes.title: Determination
episodes.plot: After reuniting with Pascal and Alicia, Shun's determination to return home is stronger than ever.

episodes.title: Girl
episodes.plot: While visiting the port city of Ametius to obtain a ship, a deadly killer threatens the adventure.

episodes.title: Lone Isle
episodes.plot: After taking to the seas on a battered ship, the Ignauts head for an island to recruit the help of the Zoozians.

episodes.title: Feelings
episodes.plot: As Delzaine and the Ignauts both close in on Babylon, Pascal attempts to solve the mystery of the decreasing Warp Particles.

episodes.title: Depths
episodes.plot: Upon reaching Babylon, the Ignauts are deceived by more than its size and the traps that await inside.

episodes.title: The Light of Babel
episodes.plot: The showdown reaches full swing as Babel starts up, bringing an end to an enemy in more than one way.

episodes.title: Tracks
episodes.plot: While Pascal and Joseph are busy inspecting Babel, the others look back on how far they've come.

episodes.title: Resume
episodes.plot: With chaos and riots on the rise, the Ignauts make plans to bring order while marching back towards the capital for more research.

episodes.title: Monster
episodes.plot: When they attempt to save a crippled village, the Ignauts run into an old enemy and make an unexpected new ally.

episodes.title: Longing
episodes.plot: In order to recruit the help of the Gradido and the island Zoozians, the Ignauts must fight back against a naval invasion.

episodes.title: Return
episodes.plot: No sooner is the group welcomed home to the castle than a meanace appears in the forest and threatens the capital.

episodes.title: Surface
episodes.plot: Taken to the surface, Shun introduces Emilio to his familiar world and a confrontation with Shun's father triggers some of Emilio's forgotten memories.

episodes.title: Past
episodes.plot: After hearing Asanaga's shocking declaration, Shun and Emilio discover secrets of the past, the truth of their families, and a shared bond.

episodes.title: Confrontation
episodes.plot: Though troubled by his father's actions, Shun learns about his motivation and the reason they're able to travel between worlds.

episodes.title: Crisis
episodes.plot: Back in Endora, the Ignauts face up against a monsterous Ibelda and learn about the ancient ruins which may be funneling Warp Particles to the surface.

episodes.title: Showdown
episodes.plot: While Demetrio and the Ignauts battle Ibelda, Shun, Emilio and Falarion go to Tir Na Nog to destroy the device draining Warp Particles from Endora.

episodes.title: Demise
episodes.plot: The final battle to determine the fate of Endora balances atop the high-reaching spire of Tir Na Nog.
